{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Fletで ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"TextField","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" や ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ElevatedButton","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" といったコントロールがありますよね。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これらは「クラス（設計図）」です。つまり、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"TextField","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" というクラスは「テキスト入力欄はこういう構造・機能を持ちます」という定義をしています。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    # TextFieldクラスを元にオブジェクトを作成
    name_input = ft.TextField(label="名前を入力")
    
    # ElevatedButtonクラスを元にオブジェクトを作成
    submit_button = ft.ElevatedButton(text="送信")

    page.add(name_input, submit_button)

ft.app(target=main)
"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["# クラスからインスタンスを作成
user1 = User("太郎")
user2 = User("花子")

print(user1.greet())  # こんにちは、太郎さん！
print(user2.greet())  # こんにちは、花子さん！"],"caption":[]}
